line_1: And the rhime at the close how it falls with a clink,
line_2: So kind are the Muses that sport on the Link.

line_1: How to get t'other line to clink;
line_2: Alternate verse, too, makes me think

line_1: 'An' if ye winna mak it clink,
line_2: Sae I gat paper in a blink,

line_1: 'An' if ye winna mak it clink,
line_2: An, down gaed stumpie in the ink:

line_1: 'An' if ye winna mak it clink,
line_2: Quoth I, 'Before I sleep a wink,

line_1: While as his loose chains loudly clink,
line_2: Thou add'st a length to every link:
